comment.author: 29899402@N06
comment._content: Yeah who knows what hes thinking, but perhaps becouse he dont have a language, he really dont think bone! Without a language the head is pritty mutch empty i belive! So i belive the dog might looked down there, just becouse it's what catched his attention, and the sound from the sea, he dont look afraid though. If you scream to the dog, he will turn back his head and have the attention on who ever made that sound! ... =P sounds like me!

comment.author: 33516515@N08
comment._content: NO!  Just because the dog doesn't have our language skills, doesn't mean he doesn't have a his own internal language.  I think they are smarter in many ways than we humans are.  He know exactly what is going on.  Don't think that because he can't talk to you about it doesn't mean he is aware!
